languages.text: {n}Вы отходите от тел, стараясь стереть из памяти образы развороченной плоти и посмертные маски, навеки застывшие на бескровных лицах.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы отходите от тел, стараясь стереть из памяти образы развороченной плоти и посмертные маски, навеки застывшие на бескровных лицах.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You walk away from the bodies, struggling to wipe the images from your memory — the mangled flesh and death masks forever imprinted on the bloodless faces.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы отходите от тел, стараясь стереть из памяти образы развороченной плоти и посмертные маски, навеки застывшие на бескровных лицах.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You walk away from the bodies, struggling to wipe the images from memory — the mangled flesh and the deathly masks forever imprinted on the bloodless faces.{/n}
{n}You walk away from the bodies, struggling to wipe the images from memory — the mangled flesh and the deathly masks forever imprinted on the bloodless faces.{/n}
{n}You walk away from the bodies, struggling to wipe the images from memory — the mangled flesh and the deathly masks forever imprinted on the bloodless faces.{/n}
{n}You walk away from the bodies, struggling to wipe the images from memory — the mangled flesh and the deathly masks forever imprinted on the bloodless faces.{/n}
{n}You walk away from the bodies, struggling to wipe the images from your memory — the mangled flesh and death masks forever imprinted on the bloodless faces.{/n}
{n}You walk away from the bodies, struggling to wipe the images from your memory — the mangled flesh and death masks forever imprinted on the bloodless faces.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你从尸堆旁边走过，努力将那些画面从你的记忆中抹除，试图忘记那些惨遭撕碎的肉体，以及没有血色的脸上死亡的印记。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You walk away from the bodies, struggling to wipe the images from your memory — the mangled flesh and death masks forever imprinted on the bloodless faces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你从尸堆旁边走过，努力将那些画面从你的记忆中抹除，试图忘记那些惨遭撕碎的肉体，以及没有血色的脸上死亡的印记。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te alejas de los cuerpos, tratando con dificultad de borrar de tu memoria las imágenes de su carne mutilada y la máscara de la muerte grabada en sus rostros sin vida por lo que ya sería la eternidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You walk away from the bodies, struggling to wipe the images from your memory — the mangled flesh and death masks forever imprinted on the bloodless faces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te alejas de los cuerpos, tratando con dificultad de borrar de tu memoria las imágenes de su carne mutilada y la máscara de la muerte grabada en sus rostros sin vida por lo que ya sería la eternidad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}死体から離れて、なんとか先程の場面を記憶から消そうとした…ズタズタの肉と仮面の死体は、青ざめた自分の脳裏に永遠に焼きついて離れない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You walk away from the bodies, struggling to wipe the images from your memory — the mangled flesh and death masks forever imprinted on the bloodless faces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}死体から離れて、なんとか先程の場面を記憶から消そうとした…ズタズタの肉と仮面の死体は、青ざめた自分の脳裏に永遠に焼きついて離れない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du entfernst dich von den Leichen und hast Mühe, das Bild aus deinem Gedächtnis zu tilgen – blutleere Gesichter, in denen malträtiertes Fleisch und Todesmasken für immer eingraviert sind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You walk away from the bodies, struggling to wipe the images from your memory — the mangled flesh and death masks forever imprinted on the bloodless faces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du entfernst dich von den Leichen und hast Mühe, das Bild aus deinem Gedächtnis zu tilgen – blutleere Gesichter, in denen malträtiertes Fleisch und Todesmasken für immer eingraviert sind.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous vous éloignez des corps en tentant d'effacer de votre mémoire l'image de leurs chairs mutilées et des masques mortuaires à jamais imprimés sur leurs visages exsangues.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You walk away from the bodies, struggling to wipe the images from your memory — the mangled flesh and death masks forever imprinted on the bloodless faces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous vous éloignez des corps en tentant d'effacer de votre mémoire l'image de leurs chairs mutilées et des masques mortuaires à jamais imprimés sur leurs visages exsangues.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parçalanmış etlerin ve kan çekilmiş yüzlere oturmuş ölüm katılığının görüntüsünü hafızandan silmeye çabalar hâlde cesetlerden uzaklaşıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You walk away from the bodies, struggling to wipe the images from your memory — the mangled flesh and death masks forever imprinted on the bloodless faces.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cesetlerden uzaklaşıyorsun ama parçalanmış et ve kan çekilmiş yüzlere oturmuş ölüm katılığı görüntülerini hafızandan silme çaban nafile.{/n}
